titleStmt.title: A sober vindication of the nobility, gentry and clergy of the Church of England: in answer to a late malicious pamphlet, entituled, A dialogue between Whig and Tory. : Licensed, Novemb. 28. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded print and print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
